name: NSDatePickerCell
desc: An object that controls the behavior of a date picker, or of a single date picker cell in a matrix.

items.name: var drawsBackground: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell draws its background.

items.name: var datePickerStyle: NSDatePicker.Style
items.desc: The date picker style to use.

items.name: var datePickerElements: NSDatePicker.ElementFlags
items.desc: A bitmask that indicates which visual elements are shown by the date picker.

items.name: var datePickerMode: NSDatePicker.Mode
items.desc: The mode in use by the date picker.

items.name: var dateValue: Date
items.desc: The date currently specified in the picker.

items.name: var timeInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time interval that represents the date range.

items.name: var calendar: Calendar?
items.desc: The calendar used by the date picker.

items.name: var locale: Locale?
items.desc: The locale used to display dates.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone used to display time-related values.

items.name: var minDate: Date?
items.desc: The minimum date that the picker allows as input.

items.name: var maxDate: Date?
items.desc: The maximum date that the picker allows as input.

items.name: var delegate: NSDatePickerCellDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate associated with the date picker.

items.name: enum NSDatePicker.Style
items.desc: Constants that define the visual appearance of the date picker cell.

items.name: enum NSDatePicker.Mode
items.desc: Constants that define whether the picker provides a single date, or a range of dates.

items.name: struct NSDatePicker.ElementFlags
items.desc: Constants that specify the date and time elements displayed by the picker.
